TopicTitle: updates to the Parts wiki page?

Articles.Content:
It looks like there haven't been any updates to the Parts wiki page in over a year: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?title=Parts&action=history

That seems unlikely since 1.1 releases have introduced new stock parts.

I've been using this page as the reference for my kerbal calculator http://fommil.github.io/kerbal/ is there a better versioned reference other than parsing the .cfg files?

That shouldn't be - the 10m inflatable shield is included in the parts section. There's a note that the wiki is experiencing server migration issues - maybe that's affecting the change logs?

That said, I see some inconsistencies in the parts - for example, the smallest landing legs are 0.015t (the correct value, IIRC) in the table on the parts page, but 0.02t in the part's detail page.

Edited July 17, 2016 by moogoob
